game.name: Agama versus Bugs
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Meet the ever-hungry bearded dragon. However, in pursuit of her next meal, she must watch out for various traps and obstacles lurking in the terrarium. Who will win in this adventure? an ever-hungry lizard or crunchy bugs?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Meet the ever-hungry bearded dragon. However, in pursuit of her next meal, she must watch out for various traps and obstacles lurking in the terrarium. Who will win in this adventure? an ever-hungry lizard or crunchy bugs?
